Class PlayerControlPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.teamsa.gambit.views.PlayerControlPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PlayerControlPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Method for creating the GUI Player Control Panel that displays player information about current bank amount, bet values and setups the buttons for place bet, hit, stay and quit
    Author:
    Team Something Awesomes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
